name: RecipeStorage
responsibilities: Stores a database of recipes. Allows for searching, addition, removing, etc.
+ loadFrom(Loader), loads recipes from a given loader's data
+ recipes(), gets all recipes in this storage
+ find(String), find recipes by name / Regex on name
+ find(Tag[]), finds recipes will all given tags
+ find(Ingredients[]), finds recipes with given ingredients

name: IngredientStorage
responsibilities: Similar to the recipe storage excepts acts as a database for all ingredient types

name: Fridge
responsibilities: An extension of the ingredient storage which solely represents which ingredients you currently have.
